title: The Stolen Crown: The Secret Marriage that Forever Changed the Fate of England
description: Trapped in the Wars of the Roses, one woman finds herself sister to the queen...and traitor to the crownKatherine Woodville's sister never gave her a choice. A happy girl of modest means, Kate hardly expected to become a maker of kings. But when her sister impulsively marries King Edward IV in secret, Katherine's life is no longer hers to control...
author: Susan Higginbotham
